video.title: 鋼の錬金術師 FULLMETAL ALCHEMIST
video.synopsis: After both suffer physical damage -- brothers Edward and Alphonse battle nefarious forces to try to reclaim their bodies in this supernatural anime.

episodes.synopsis: The Elric brothers take part in a manhunt for the dangerous Isaac the Freezer, a former State Alchemist bent on bringing Führer Bradley down.
episodes.title: Fullmetal Alchemist

episodes.synopsis: A glimpse into the past reveals the pain and desperation that drove the Elric boys to break alchemy's greatest taboo: human transmutation.
episodes.title: The First Day

episodes.synopsis: Science and faith collide when the Elrics confront Father Cornello, who may be abusing a Philosopher's Stone to manipulate his flock.
episodes.title: City of Heresy

episodes.synopsis: The Elrics meet Shou Tucker, who has much to teach Ed and Al about alchemy -- and the horrible cruelty that sometimes accompanies it.
episodes.title: An Alchemist's Anguish

episodes.synopsis: Edward and Alphonse are attacked by Scar, a mysterious and incredibly powerful killer wanted for a string of gruesome murders.
episodes.title: Rain of Sorrows

episodes.synopsis: The Elrics meet Dr. Marcoh, a State Alchemist running from past sins who has information that could put the Philosopher's Stone within reach.
episodes.title: Road of Hope

episodes.synopsis: Having discovered the horrific ingredient in a Philosopher's Stone, the Elrics prowl the grounds of a secret laboratory in search of more facts.
episodes.title: Hidden Truths

episodes.synopsis: Ed and Al furiously battle the Fifth Laboratory's psychotic guards. In the chaos, the truth behind the Philosopher's Stone is buried in the rubble.
episodes.title: The Fifth Laboratory

episodes.synopsis: When Al becomes angry over the thought that his entire existence was simply created by his brother, only Winry can convince him just how wrong he is.
episodes.title: Created Feelings

episodes.synopsis: When the conspiracy surrounding the Philosopher's Stone closes in on the military's highest ranks, one of Mustang's most trusted allies is murdered.
episodes.title: Separate Destinations

episodes.synopsis: The Elrics, realizing alchemy has yet to unlock the mysteries of creating life, feel powerless when a new friend goes into labor.
episodes.title: Miracle at Rush Valley

episodes.synopsis: While visiting Izumi, their childhood teacher, the Elrics recall the early difficulties of grasping the concept of equivalent exchange.
episodes.title: One is All, All is One

episodes.synopsis: When Al is abducted by chimeras and Ed's rescue attempt falls short, Izumi proves once more that she's got the brothers' best interests in mind.
episodes.title: Beasts of Dublith

episodes.synopsis: In a clash with Greed, King Bradley proves to be a brutal opponent. But the man who destroys the Ultimate Shield is more potent than even the Führer.
episodes.title: Those Who Lurk Underground

episodes.synopsis: The Elrics scuffle with Ling Yao and his attendants, Lan Fan and Fu -- visitors from Xing seeking the Philosopher's Stone.
episodes.title: Envoy from the East

episodes.synopsis: Envy still hides in plain sight among the State Alchemists, and another Homunculus is on the verge of infiltrating their ranks.
episodes.title: Footsteps of a Comrade-in-Arms

episodes.synopsis: Even those most loyal to the Flame Alchemist are shaken by the controversial action he takes against the accused killer of Maes Hughes.
episodes.title: Cold Flame

episodes.synopsis: Ed's journey to a distant land offers surprising details behind Mustang's alleyway encounter with Ross. Elric learns a secret about Winry's parents.
episodes.title: The Arrogant Palm of a Small Human

episodes.synopsis: Mustang, Alphonse, Havoc and Hawkeye split up to search a military laboratory. If Lust has her way, none of them will ever see each other alive again.
episodes.title: Death of the Undying

episodes.synopsis: Hohenheim's visit ends with a grave warning to Pinako, but among the ruins of his childhood Ed finds hope that Al can be returned to his body.
episodes.title: Father Before the Grave

episodes.synopsis: Ed and Al devise a perilous strategy to lure the Homunculi out of hiding. Step one: risk death at the hands of their most dangerous enemy, Scar.
episodes.title: Advance of the Fool

episodes.synopsis: Upon learning the role that Scar played in her parents' deaths, Winry claims as her own the same murderous feelings that possess Scar.
episodes.title: Backs in the Distance

episodes.synopsis: Cooperation between Mustang's cabal and Ling Yao's band leads to the capture of a Homunculus -- but also gets the attention of a Homunculus spy.
episodes.title: Girl on the Battlefield

episodes.synopsis: Gluttony's twisted powers overwhelm the Elrics. Meanwhile, Mustang acts on his suspicions about Bradley and finds himself in the belly of the beast.
episodes.title: Inside the Belly

episodes.synopsis: Ed and Ling face a horrific enemy within the hellish expanse of Gluttony's gut. In Central, Mustang can only watch as Bradley divides his soldiers.
episodes.title: Doorway of Darkness

episodes.synopsis: Alarming truths are revealed when Al finds the one called Father and Ed once again breaks alchemy's greatest taboo.
episodes.title: Reunion

episodes.synopsis: Visions of the past play out as Hohenheim reflects on the follies of man: the pain that comes with family, the truths of alchemy and the roots of war.
episodes.title: Interlude Party

episodes.synopsis: The Elrics come face-to-face with Father. Ed and Al can only watch as Father creates a new Homunculus with alchemy that should be impossible.
episodes.title: Father

episodes.synopsis: If the brothers make one wrong move, those dearest to them will suffer at the hands of Bradley. Also, there may be no need for a Philosopher's Stone.
episodes.title: Struggle of the Fool

episodes.synopsis: As Edward hears Hawkeye's tale of a time when young soldiers were tasked with genocide, the horrors of the Ishvalan battlefield are revealed.
episodes.title: The Ishvalan War of Extermination

episodes.synopsis: Even as his subordinates are scattered, Mustang finds he still has allies -- unfortunately, so do his enemies. The Homunculi unleash a killer.
episodes.title: The 520 Cens Promise

episodes.synopsis: A secret encounter allows Mustang to spark new ambition in an old friend -- an ally with troops. Meanwhile, Ed and Al meet their biggest fan.
episodes.title: The Fuhrer's Son

episodes.synopsis: The northern borderlands become a battlefield when Kimblee closes in on Scar. Ed and Al fight the bitter elements as they try to reach Fort Briggs.
episodes.title: The Northern Wall of Briggs

episodes.synopsis: The soldiers at Fort Briggs remain vigilant against the threat of spies. The compound seems impenetrable -- but a violent intruder proves otherwise.
episodes.title: Ice Queen

episodes.synopsis: Ed unveils a conspiracy of staggering scope: a plot that has already claimed countless victims. Clues suggest bloodshed will also come to Fort Briggs.
episodes.title: The Shape of This Country

episodes.synopsis: As Raven tries to corrupt Armstrong, Ed and Al must wait in a cell. Long ago, their father faced captivity, and to escape the pain, he said good-bye.
episodes.title: Family Portrait

episodes.synopsis: Hawkeye is shocked when the first Homunculus reveals itself. Kimblee makes an offer to Edward, but he first must agree to become a mass murderer.
episodes.title: The First Homunculus

episodes.synopsis: When Scar is cornered by a pair of chimeras, the Elrics become unlikely allies with Scar.  Later, Winry's attempt to confront Scar ends in disaster.
episodes.title: Conflict at Baschool

episodes.synopsis: Winry's abduction by Scar is revealed, but a rescue plan must still be hatched. A brutal storm is coming -- one which only Alphonse Elric can brave.
episodes.title: Daydream

episodes.synopsis: Long ago, the blood of a simple slave was used in an experiment that created a strange, shapeless being.
episodes.title: The Dwarf in the Flask

episodes.synopsis: Bound by more than blood, the Elrics have long shared joy and pain. Now, the mystical connection of their souls could prove fatal.
episodes.title: The Abyss

episodes.synopsis: May and Marcoh's efforts to decode the research of Scar's brother yield progress, but it might be too late to prevent catastrophe.
episodes.title: Signs of a Counter Offensive

episodes.synopsis: In the snowy north, the soldiers of Fort Briggs engage an invading army, and Marcoh leads an attack against monstrous Envy.
episodes.title: Bite of the Ant

episodes.synopsis: Hohenheim and Alphonse enjoy a chance to get reacquainted. Their bond is restored with ease, inspiring the father to share his secrets with his sons.
episodes.title: Revving at Full-throttle

episodes.synopsis: Quiet warnings spread near and far: The Promised Day is at hand.
episodes.title: The Promised Day

episodes.synopsis: Those who have prepared to reclaim a nation find their plans exposed. The chaos multiplies after an assassin strikes down a mighty leader.
episodes.title: Looming Shadows

episodes.synopsis: A sinister voice rings out from the shell of Al's armor, and Ed and Greed find themselves under attack.
episodes.title: Emissary of Darkness

episodes.synopsis: After investigating the twisted roots of the Bradley family tree, Mustang gathers his most loyal troops.
episodes.title: The Oath in the Tunnel

episodes.synopsis: With his father's help, Al takes incredible steps to contain the monstrous Pride.
episodes.title: Filial Affection

episodes.synopsis: Mustang leads a ragtag assault force of hardy northern troops -- and welcome faces from the past -- against Central's defenses.
episodes.title: Upheaval in Central

episodes.synopsis: Ed's crew faces a horde of ravenous mannequins, abominations powered by human souls.
episodes.title: The Immortal Legion

episodes.synopsis: With a Philosopher's Stone in his possession, Alphonse fearlessly engages Pride and Kimblee.
episodes.title: Combined Strength
